PDF → Word (DOCX)

Convert PDF files to editable Word documents (DOCX). dexpdf offers a privacy-first, browser-side converter for simple layouts.

Open dexpdf tools

How to use

  1. Open the PDF → Word tool on the main site.
  2. Drop or select your PDF file.
  3. Download the converted DOCX when ready.

Notes

Complex PDFs with advanced layouts may require a server-side conversion for best fidelity.

FAQ

Is my file uploaded to a server?

Basic conversions are processed locally in your browser. Large or high-fidelity conversions may use server-side processing.

What file types are supported?

We accept PDF files. The output is a DOCX file for Word.

How accurate is the conversion?

Simple, text-based PDFs convert well. Complex layouts may require manual adjustment or a server-side converter for best fidelity.
